textBox.richText: Member of the biometric team from Aug 2010 to July 2012. PostDoc on face recognition. Involved in the project BBfor2. Roy completed his PhD at the Speech, Audio, Image & Video Technology lab at the Queensland University of Technology (QUT), Australia. Through his doctoral work in the field of spoken term detection, he has been involved in patent applications, and has performed commercial evaluations of his research. He has also established research collaborations with the Norwegian University of Science and Technology, and Fraunhofer in Germany. In 2008 he enjoyed an internship at Microsoft Research Asia in Beijing, publishing his work there on unsupervised adaptation for speech transcription.
